text: @tariqnasheed Imagine, that u live in Wuhan. One day, someone or something spreaded a virus. Ur mother died, ur father died, ur sister got sick.. U lost half of ur family, even could not take their bodies, u had to look after ur 1-year old nephew... And people call it Wuhan virus??? F U.
